channel.title: Andres Laza Moreno on Simba Tango
channel.description: Recent content in Andres Laza Moreno on Simba Tango

item.title: Hurrying slowly
item.author: simbatango@gmail.com (Simba)
item.description: –So when are you guys going on tour? –Well. I don’t know. It’s no hurry… A few months later, they are teaching and performing in Hong Kong. Never in a hurry, but moving along nicely. Just as it is supposed to be.
